name: Recover
headline: Government-funded online addiction treatment
description:
Recover provides more effective and affordable addiction treatment via telemedicine. We partner with local governments to save lives and taxpayer dollars.

More than 20 million Americans struggle with addiction, but less than 10% of people who need it receive treatment. For those that do, it usually does not work - only 8% get better. Most of this treatment is funded by governments, and goes to programs that are frequently predatory, and focus more on profit than people.

We have created an effective, accessible, and affordable solution: Recover. We offer a proven approach using medication and counseling, that can improve outcomes for over 70% of patients. It reduces overdoses by 80%, death by 50%, and has years of research and application showing it works. 

Despite how effective this medication can be, most rehabs do not have medical professionals on staff. Not only does our program work better and bring medicine to addiction care, it also costs just 10% of traditional programs.

Nick founded Recover after seeing his family and friends struggle with addiction. He was raised by a drug addict, has an alcoholic brother, and lost an uncle to heroin. He saw how hard it is for people to get the treatment they need, and how ineffective existing options are. We are working to make sure that people like Nick’s family have access to best-in-class addiction treatment so they can get and stay well.

# Effective, on–demand substance use treatment
###### ✓ No waitlist ✓ Same-day enrollments ✓ In-network with Medi-Cal ✓ Telehealth option
[Enroll as a patient](https://www.letsrecover.com/<https:/www.letsrecover.com/enroll>)
[Refer a patient](https://www.letsrecover.com/<https:/www.letsrecover.com/referrals>)
## Let's Recover
Recover provides effective, accessible, and innovative substance use treatment with a telehealth option. We partner with state and local governments to help combat substance use in their communities.
## effective
Our methods have been shown to be effective for over 70% of patients
## accessible
Through our telehealth option, services can be accessed by anyone with a smartphone, tablet, or computer
## INNOVATIVE
We leverage data, technology, and novel clinical protocols to provide best-in-class treatment
Medical Care • Care Coordination • Counseling
​
## COMPREHENSIVE Treatment
We provide comprehensive treatment featuring medical care, care coordination, and counseling. You will have a dedicated team to help with all aspects of your substance use and behavioral health challenges. Access to evidence-based care integrating medical treatment has been shown to improve outcomes for over 70% of patients.
[Get Started](https://www.letsrecover.com/<https:/www.letsrecover.com/enroll>)
[Learn More](https://www.letsrecover.com/<https:/www.letsrecover.com/patients>)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/b98b60_dd020f79fb704437940707ec221e02f1~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_115,h_97,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/b98b60_dd020f79fb704437940707ec221e02f1~mv2.png)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/b98b60_72c96c722ce043debcf879678a058802~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_108,h_216,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/b98b60_72c96c722ce043debcf879678a058802~mv2.png)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/b98b60_97ec02fe43c648a191b4afa5bc2991c5~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_52,h_76,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/b98b60_97ec02fe43c648a191b4afa5bc2991c5~mv2.png)
## Confronting an American Epidemic
### 20 M
Americans struggle with substance use
Over 20 million Americans struggle with substance use. Less than 10% get treatment, and even then, most methods are only effective for 8% of patients. Although medication-assisted treatment (MAT) can improve outcomes up to 10 times for substance use disorders, most treatment programs do not include medical treatment. 
​
​
Recover is working to change that. We're an evidence-based, tech-enabled treatment program working to make best-in-class treatment available to everyone who needs it. We use scientific principles to expand access to treatment, reduce overdoses, and save lives. We are also committed to reducing the cost of treatment to save taxpayer dollars and allow more people access to recovery. That's why we're working to make substance use treatment effective, accessible, and innovative. 
### 48 
States can't meet demand for MAT

generated_description:
**Recover: Revolutionizing Addiction Treatment**

Recover is a game-changer in the field of addiction treatment, utilizing government funding to make its services accessible, effective, and affordable through telemedicine. Founded in 2021 by Nick, who has a personal connection to the struggles of addiction within his family, Recover stands on a mission to combat the staggering reality that over **20 million Americans** face substance use challenges. Alarmingly, less than **10%** of those in need actually receive treatment, and for the minority that do, the success rate hovers around a mere **8%**.

This is where Recover steps in. The company has crafted a more effective model that integrates medication and counseling, boasting improvement outcomes for over **70%** of its patients. The approach is backed by extensive research, showing that it can reduce overdoses by an impressive **80%** and mortality rates by **50%**. Unlike traditional rehab centers that often operate like businesses more focused on profit than people—lacking medical professionals—Recover ensures a comprehensive and compassionate care system.

What sets Recover apart is not just its mission, but its innovative use of technology. Patients benefit from a seamless telehealth option, making treatment remarkably more accessible. You can enroll without a waiting list, receive same-day care, and utilize a service that costs just **10%** of traditional programs.

Located in an undisclosed area, Recover is a small but dedicated team of **10** employees, working under the mentorship of Group Partner Michael Seibel from Y Combinator Batch W21. They’re not just another startup; they’re part of a critical movement to ensure that treatment isn't just a privilege for the few, but a right for everyone who needs it.

If you or someone you know is facing addiction challenges and needs support, check out Recover’s website at [letsrecover.com](https://www.letsrecover.com). Together, we can fight addiction and make recovery accessible for all.
